item.title: Road has more holes than swiss cheese. Disgraceful and Very Dangerous. How does this continue to be ignored?, 27th February

item.title: Potholes merging into each other along this stretch of road. Very dangerous. Causing damage to cars especially when it’s rains and holes cannot be seen as well. Extremely dangerous to other road users in these conditions. It’s more like off roading than driving and a theory reduced speed limit needs to be in place with warning signs. It’s a resurfacing issue now., 27th February
item.description:
Very easy to see - it cannot be missed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights, 27th February
item.description:
Hi, we have no streets lights in Hitchlands drive, we have been living here for 8 years now and have never had any sort of lighting, we have mentioned it to the council on countless of occasions and the furthest they ever got was putting dodgy cement patches for solar Ballard lights, we do get drug activity due to it behind dark at night and they can easily hide away, we also get other dodgy activities going down that seems like gang related, we all have kids living in the cul-de-sac and some of the kids have autism.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Kingsmead Avenue, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large rotten tree stump, 27th February
item.description:
